channel.title: How do i change, quest to being complete when people first log in?
channel.description: Title explains it all, but i'll re cap it. How do i make it to where quest are complete when players first log in.

item.title: How do i change, quest to being complete when people first log in?

item.description:
@use_are_client wrote:

Well, i know where it’s located, but when a player first logs in i want the quest to already beem complete for them, and be able to use the rewards of the quest.
